body:
Sports bettors providing 2021 Oscars Predictions?

Yeah. Fark yeah.

We bet on anything we can find an edge. And that definitely includes entertainment and political markets.

The first of those in 2021 is the Grammys.

And the betting markets are dominated by the divas.

In this Grammys Predictions piece, we'll look at the most popular betting markets:

> * Best Picture
> * Leading Actor
> * Leading Actress
> * Supporting Actor
> * Supporting Actress

- - -

## **Best Picture**

<canvas id='g112' name="brgraph" data-file-name="oscarsBestPicture.json" data-only-names="Nomadland,The Trial of the Chicago 7,One Nioght In Miami,Mank,Minari,Promising Young Woman,Judas And The Black Messiah" data-start="2021-02-26 00:00" width="400" height="150"></canvas>

- - -

## **Leading Actor**

Chadwick Boseman is an overwhelming favorite. 

His heart breaking fight with cancer and Golden Globe winning effort in Ma Rainey's Black Bottom makes him impossible to bet against. 

Riz Ahmed is the only other runner in the market.

<canvas id='g111' name="brgraph" data-file-name="oscarsLeadingActor.json" data-only-names="Chadwick Boseman,Riz Ahmed" data-start="2021-02-26 00:00" width="400" height="150"></canvas>

- - -

## **Leading Actress**

<canvas id='g113' name="brgraph" data-file-name="oscarsLeadingActress.json" data-only-names="Viola Davis,Carey Mulligan,Frances McDormand" data-start="2021-02-26 00:00" width="400" height="150"></canvas>

- - -

## **Supporting Actor**

<canvas id='g114' name="brgraph" data-file-name="oscarsSupportingActor.json" data-only-names="Sacha Baron Cohen,Leslie Odom Jr.,Daniel Kaluuya" data-start="2021-02-26 00:00" width="400" height="150"></canvas>

- - -

## **Supporting Actress**

<canvas id='g114' name="brgraph" data-file-name="oscarsSupportingActress.json" data-only-names="Glenn Close,Jodie Foster,Olivia Colman,Ellen Burstyn" data-start="2021-02-26 00:00" width="400" height="150"></canvas>

- - -
title: Oscars Predictions 2021: Your Best Bets
description: If you want expert 2021 Oscars Predictions, from professional sports bettors, then click on through. Unlike the blog crowd, we put our money where our mouth is. 2021 Oscars Predictions.
